51#ifndef AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_INTERNAL_H
52#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_INTERNAL_H
53
54
55//*****************************************************************************
56//
57// Peripheral enable bits for am_hal_pwrctrl_periph_enable/disable()
58//
59//*****************************************************************************
60#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_IOS (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOS, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOS_EN))
61#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_IOM0 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOM0, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOM0_EN))
62#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_IOM1 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOM1, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOM1_EN))
63#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_IOM2 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOM2, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOM2_EN))
64#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_IOM3 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOM3, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOM3_EN))
65#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_IOM4 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOM4, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOM4_EN))
66#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_IOM5 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOM5, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRIOM5_EN))
67#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_UART0 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRUART0, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRUART0_EN))
68#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_UART1 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRUART1, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRUART1_EN))
69#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_ADC (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRADC, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRADC_EN))
70#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_SCARD (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRSCARD, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRSCARD_EN))
71#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MSPI (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRMSPI, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRMSPI_EN))
72#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PDM (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRPDM, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRPDM_EN))
73#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_BLEL (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRBLEL, PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_PWRBLEL_EN))
74
75#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_DEVPWREN_MASK 0x00003FFF
76#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_DEVPWRSTATUS_MASK 0x000003FC
77
78//*****************************************************************************
79//
80// Memory enable values for all defined memory configurations.
81//
82//*****************************************************************************
83#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_8K_DTCM (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_DTCM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_DTCM_GROUP0DTCM0))
84#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_32K_DTCM (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_DTCM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_DTCM_GROUP0))
85#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_64K_DTCM (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_DTCM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_DTCM_ALL))
86#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_96K \
87 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_64K_DTCM | \
88 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM_GROUP0))
89#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_128K \
90 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_96K | \
91 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM_GROUP1))
92#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_160K \
93 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_128K | \
94 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM_GROUP2))
95#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_192K \
96 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_160K | \
97 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM_GROUP3))
98#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_224K \
99 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_192K | \
100 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM_GROUP4))
101#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_256K \
102 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_224K | \
103 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM_GROUP5))
104#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_288K \
105 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_256K | \
106 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM_GROUP6))
107#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_320K \
108 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_288K | \
109 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM_GROUP7))
110#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_352K \
111 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_320K | \
112 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM_GROUP8))
113#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_384K \
114 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_352K | \
115 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM_GROUP9))
116
117#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_ALL (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_384K)
118#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_FLASH_512K PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_FLASH0_Msk
119#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_FLASH_1M \
120 (PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_FLASH0_Msk | PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_FLASH1_Msk)
121#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_CACHE \
122 (PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_CACHEB0_Msk | PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_CACHEB2_Msk)
123#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_CACHE_DIS (~AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_CACHE)
124
125//
126// Power up all available memory devices (this is the default power up state)
127//
128#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_ALL \
129 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_DTCM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_DTCM_ALL) | \
130 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_SRAM_ALL) | \
131 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_FLASH0, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_FLASH0_EN) | \
132 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_FLASH1, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_FLASH1_EN) | \
133 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_CACHEB0, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_CACHEB0_EN) | \
134 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_CACHEB2, PWRCTRL_MEMPWREN_CACHEB2_EN))
135
136//*****************************************************************************
137//
138// Memory deepsleep powerdown values for all defined memory configurations.
139//
140//*****************************************************************************
141#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_8K_DTCM (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_DTCMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_DTCMPWDSLP_GROUP0DTCM0))
142#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_32K_DTCM (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_DTCMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_DTCMPWDSLP_GROUP0))
143#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_64K_DTCM (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_DTCMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_DTCMPWDSLP_ALL))
144#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_96K \
145 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_64K_DTCM | \
146 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP_GROUP0))
147#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_128K \
148 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_96K | \
149 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP_GROUP1))
150#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_160K \
151 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_128K | \
152 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP_GROUP2))
153#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_192K \
154 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_160K | \
155 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP_GROUP3))
156#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_224K \
157 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_192K | \
158 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP_GROUP4))
159#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_256K \
160 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_224K | \
161 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP_GROUP5))
162#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_288K \
163 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_256K | \
164 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP_GROUP6))
165#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_320K \
166 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_288K | \
167 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP_GROUP7))
168#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_352K \
169 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_320K | \
170 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP_GROUP8))
171#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_384K \
172 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_352K | \
173 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP_GROUP9))
174
175#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_ALL (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAM_384K)
176#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_FLASH_512K PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_FLASH0PWDSLP_Msk
177#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_FLASH_1M \
178 (PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_FLASH0PWDSLP_Msk | PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_FLASH1PWDSLP_Msk)
179#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_CACHE (PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_CACHEPWDSLP_Msk)
180#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_CACHE_DIS (~AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_CACHE)
181
182//
183// Power down all available memory devices
184//
185#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_ALL \
186 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_DTCMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_DTCMPWDSLP_ALL) | \
187 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_SRAMPWDSLP_ALL) | \
188 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_FLASH0PWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_FLASH0PWDSLP_EN) | \
189 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_FLASH1PWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_FLASH1PWDSLP_EN) | \
190 _VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_CACHEPWDSLP, PWRCTRL_MEMPWDINSLEEP_CACHEPWDSLP_EN))
191
192//*****************************************************************************
193//
194// Memory status values for all defined memory configurations
195//
196//*****************************************************************************
197#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_8K_DTCM \
198 (PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_DTCM00_Msk)
199#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_32K_DTCM \
200 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_8K_DTCM | \
201 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_DTCM01_Msk)
202#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_64K_DTCM \
203 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_32K_DTCM | \
204 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_DTCM1_Msk)
205#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_96K \
206 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_64K_DTCM | \
207 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_SRAM0_Msk)
208#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_128K \
209 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_96K | \
210 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_SRAM1_Msk)
211#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_160K \
212 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_128K | \
213 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_SRAM2_Msk)
214#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_192K \
215 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_160K | \
216 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_SRAM3_Msk)
217#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_224K \
218 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_192K | \
219 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_SRAM4_Msk)
220#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_256K \
221 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_224K | \
222 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_SRAM5_Msk)
223#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_288K \
224 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_256K | \
225 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_SRAM6_Msk)
226#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_320K \
227 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_288K | \
228 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_SRAM7_Msk)
229#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_352K \
230 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_320K | \
231 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_SRAM8_Msk)
232#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_384K \
233 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_352K | \
234 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_SRAM9_Msk)
235#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_ALL \
236 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_384K)
237#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_FLASH_512K \
238 (PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_FLASH0_Msk)
239#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_FLASH_1M \
240 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_FLASH_512K | \
241 PWRCTRL_MEMPWRSTATUS_FLASH1_Msk)
242#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_ALL \
243 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_SRAM_384K | \
244 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_FLASH_1M)

246//*****************************************************************************
247//
248// Memory event values for all defined memory configurations
249//
250//*****************************************************************************
251#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_8K_DTCM \
252 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_DTCMEN, \
253 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_DTCMEN_GROUP0DTCM0EN))
254#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_32K_DTCM \
255 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_DTCMEN, \
256 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_DTCMEN_GROUP0EN))
257#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_64K_DTCM \
258 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_DTCMEN, \
259 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_DTCMEN_ALL))
260#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_96K \
261 ((_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_DTCMEN, \
262 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_DTCMEN_ALL)) | \
263 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN, \
264 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN_GROUP0EN)))
265#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_128K \
266 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_96K | \
267 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN, \
268 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN_GROUP1EN)))
269#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_160K \
270 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_128K | \
271 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN, \
272 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN_GROUP2EN)))
273#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_192K \
274 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_160K | \
275 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN, \
276 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN_GROUP3EN)))
277#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_224K \
278 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_192K | \
279 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN, \
280 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN_GROUP4EN)))
281#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_256K \
282 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_224K | \
283 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN, \
284 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN_GROUP5EN)))
285#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_288K \
286 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_256K | \
287 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN, \
288 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN_GROUP6EN)))
289#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_320K \
290 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_288K | \
291 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN, \
292 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN_GROUP7EN)))
293#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_352K \
294 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_320K | \
295 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN, \
296 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN_GROUP8EN)))
297#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_384K \
298 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_352K | \
299 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN, \
300 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAMEN_GROUP9EN)))
301#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_FLASH_512K \
302 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_FLASH0EN, \
303 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_FLASH0EN_EN))
304#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_FLASH_1M \
305 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_FLASH_512K | \
306 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_FLASH1EN, \
307 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_FLASH1EN_EN)))
308#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_CACHE \
309 ((_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_CACHEB0EN, \
310 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_CACHEB0EN_EN)) | \
311 (_VAL2FLD(PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_CACHEB2EN, \
312 PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_CACHEB2EN_EN)))
313#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_ALL \
314 (AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_SRAM_384K | \
315 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_FLASH_1M | \
316 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMPWREVENTEN_CACHE)
317
318//*****************************************************************************
319//
320// Memory region mask values for all defined memory configurations
321//
322//*****************************************************************************
323#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_REGION_SRAM_MASK AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_SRAM_ALL
324#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_REGION_FLASH_MASK AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_FLASH_1M
325#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_REGION_CACHE_MASK AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_CACHE
326#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_REGION_ALT_CACHE_MASK AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_CACHE
327#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_REGION_ALL_MASK AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEMEN_ALL
328#define AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_REGION_ALT_ALL_MASK AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PWRONSTATUS_ALL

331#endif // AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_INTERNAL_H
